meanings: (속도·행동 등이) fast, quick, rapid, speedy, swift

vlive.korean: 제이홉! 멋있어! 여유 있어! 연예인 같아 - 원래 저 텀이 더 빨라야 되는 거 아니야? j-hope! Cool! Nice, like a celebrity! - Shouldn't that term be faster? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: j-hope! Cool! Nice, like a celebrity! - Shouldn't that term be faster?

vlive.korean: [2분 48초보다 빨라야 한다!] [Must be quicker than 2 minutes 48 seconds!] View video 모해 MOHAE : [WekiMeki 위키미키 모해?] EP33

[두 번째 포인트 안무 - STEP 4] [슥슥- 슥슥- 쓸며 스텝을 교차해준다] 모아주시고 당기고 빨라야 돼요. [STEP 4] Bring them together then pull. It has to be fast. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 느와르 호연의 SHOOT OUT 추는 법 (HOW TO DANCE RYU HOYEON’s ‘SHOOT OUT’)
vlive.english: [STEP 4] Bring them together then pull. It has to be fast.

vlive.korean: 정말 손가락이 빨라야 돼요. You need to move your fingers fast. 듣기 View video NCT : Park&Zhong 고민상담소📋💚
vlive.english: You need to move your fingers fast.

vlive.korean: [두뇌야 허리 업!] 회전이 빨라야 돼. [Brain, hurry up!] You need to think quickly. 듣기 View video 파파런치 에이프릴박스 (Papalunch Aprilbox) : 파파런치 에이프릴박스 Ep08 <체리부녀's 이심전심>
vlive.english: [Brain, hurry up!] You need to think quickly.

examples.korean: You need nimble fingers for that job. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 일을 하려면 손이 빨라야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You need nimble fingers for that job. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My thinking is that the starting date should actually be earlier. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 개시일은 사실상 더 빨라야 한다는 것이 제 생각입니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: My thinking is that the starting date should actually be earlier. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Short accounts make long friends. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 셈이 빨라야 친분이 오래간다. Neungyule
examples.english: Short accounts make long friends. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You have to be very fast to leg out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 안타로 만들기 위해서는 당신이 매우 빨라야 합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You have to be very fast to leg out. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My boss just gave me something I need to finish today, and it’s going to take me until at least six o’clock. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 부장님이 방금 오늘 중으로 끝내야 할 일을 주셨는데, 작업이 빨라야6시에 끝날 것 같아요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My boss just gave me something I need to finish today, and it’s going to take me until at least six o’clock. Add to Wordbook
